lead_paragraph: This opera based on a short story by Judy Budnitz will be performed at the Skirball Center for the Performing Arts Jan. 9-11.
snippet: This opera based on a short story by Judy Budnitz will be performed at the Skirball Center for the Performing Arts Jan. 9-11.

headline.main: ‘Dog Days’ Is Centerpiece of Prototype Festival
headline.print_headline: Lauded New Opera  Gets Another Replay

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Skirball Center for the Performing Arts

abstract: David T Little and Royce Vavrek new music opera Dog Days will have its New York premiere at Skirball Center for the Performing Arts as part of Prototype: Opera/Theater/Now festival.
